xuiEmpty
directive in module xui

Description

XUI Empty component.

Usage

as element:
<xui-empty
       empty-data="{IEmptyData}">
</xui-empty>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
empty-dataIEmptyData

Empty data parameters object. Currently available parameters are:

PropertyTypeDetails
preset
(optional)
EmptyVariant

One of basic empty presets: "dataNotAvailable", "serverUnreachable", "dataNotApplicable", "emptyDataset". In case it is specified, there is no need to indicate other parameters.

(default: 'emptyDataset')

compact-mode
(optional)
string

Switch to compact mode without title - type 'B' on mockups https://projects.invisionapp.com/share/9NAGTYRYD#/screens/228007966_Placeholder_Compositions)

(default: false)

image
(optional)
string

The image to be rendered(xui-image). Able to handle custom paths and default graphics library.

(default: 'no-data-to-show')

title
(optional)
string

Empty heading text.

(default: '')

description
(optional)
string

Empty description text.

(default: 'No data to show')

template-url
(optional)
string

Parameter specifying common URL for custom templates. If none is provided the default template is used

(default: null)

viewModel
(optional)
IEmptyViewModel

Object with data to be passed to the empty controller's scope if custom template is used. Use ctrl alias to access the object. The common case is to pass a searchTerm string {{ctrl.viewModel.searchTerm}}. IEmptyViewModel is a generic type, it should be used along with the specified type/interface. For instance, viewModel: IEmptyViewModel<{searchTerm: string}> = {searchTerm: ""}

(default: {})

Example
